channel.title: Spectrum - eohr, INDIR3CT, Gavin Graye [Future Bass]
channel.description:
So one day @INDIR3CT, @Graye, and I were on the "Who do you want to collaborate with?" sub and Gavin said
[quote="Graye, post:210, topic:3183"] There a lot: ... @INDIR3CT ... ... @eohr ... [/quote]
and I said
[quote="eohr, post:215, topic:3183"] @Graye @INDIR3CT Southborne but I can’t @ him Lots of others but I’m too lazy [/quote]
and then INDIR3CT said
[quote="INDIR3CT, post:216, topic:3183, full:true"] @Graye and @eohr lets do it [/quote]
After about 4 months we came up with this track and decided to submit it to Frontier (and to my surprise, they accepted: **yeehaw!**) INDIR3CT gave it a super chill trappy feel, as he can always do. Then I threw in some funky chords and gave them some fancy volume automation. And, at the end, Gavin took it away with a huge epic drop that words fail to describe...
So you'll just have to listen to it to find out!
https://soundcloud.com/wearefrontier/spectrum
[spoiler]hope yall enjoy[/spoiler]

item.title: Spectrum - eohr, INDIR3CT, Gavin Graye [Future Bass]
item.dc:creator: eohr
item.description:
So one day @INDIR3CT, @Graye, and I were on the “Who do you want to collaborate with?” sub and Gavin said

Who would you really like to collaborate with?

There a lot:
…
@INDIR3CT
…
…
@eohr
…

and I said

Who would you really like to collaborate with?

@Graye
@INDIR3CT
Southborne but I can’t @ him
Lots of others but I’m too lazy

and then INDIR3CT said

Who would you really like to collaborate with?

@Graye and @eohr lets do it

After about 4 months we came up with this track and decided to submit it to Frontier (and to my surprise, they accepted: yeehaw!) INDIR3CT gave it a super chill trappy feel, as he can always do. Then I threw in some funky chords and gave them some fancy volume automation. And, at the end, Gavin took it away with a huge epic drop that words fail to describe…

So you’ll just have to listen to it to find out!

https://soundcloud.com/wearefrontier/spectrum

spoiler

Read full topic
